Title: The Dawn of the Sad Street
Actors: Anahit Qocharyan, Guzh Manukyan, Vardan Mkrtchyan, Armen Sargsyan
Plot: Life in Gyumri during the Karabakh war is full of hope and disappointment. Men work for their living, women wait for the return of their husbands and sons, efforts are topped by coming victory.
